properties.headline: Flood Watch remains in effect through Sunday for All Islands
properties.description:
...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY...

WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain is possible

WHERE...All Islands

WHEN...Through Sunday

IMPACTS...Flash flooding is possible due to heavy showers across the islands, in low lying and vulnerable areas. Strong runoffs and pooling on the roadways is also possible. Low visibility due to heavy showers will also impact drivers on roadways.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

&&

Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa
Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS
1255 Vaveao Aso Toonai Tesema 27 2025

...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE ASO SA...

MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa

NOFOAGA...motu uma a Amerika Samoa

TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Sa

AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e ono fa`atupula`ia ai lologa ma tafega i luga o le atunu`u, ae maise nofoaga maualalo ma nofoaga a`afia gofie. O tafega ma vaivai i luga o auala tele e ono tutupu mai. E fa`aitiitia fo`i le va`ai mamao ona a timuga mamafa ma e a`afia ai ave ta`avale i luga o auala tele.

FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA...

O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.

$$
properties.instruction: Monitor forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.
properties.areaDesc: Tutuila, Aunuu, Manua, Swains Island, Rose Atoll
